role_description: An Ansible role that installs Nextcloud Client on nearly any system
role_description_full_overview: [Nextcloud Client](https://nextcloud.com) is a tool to keep your files synchronized between your Nextcloud server and your desktop. Select one or more directories on your local machine and always have access to your latest files wherever you are
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Nextcloud Client on nearly any system.
